description.en_US: A wide-ranged spinning move hitting many nearby enemies.
description.pt_BR: A wide-ranged spinning move hitting many nearby enemies.
description.de_DE: Eine weitreichende Drehattacke, die viele nahe Gegner trifft.
description.zh_CN: 大范围旋转招式，击中附近所有敌人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 大範圍旋轉招式，擊中附近所有敵人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 広範囲の回転攻撃で、近くの敵を多く巻き込むことができる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 근처의 많은 적을 공격하는 넓은 범위의 스핀 공격입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Fire a mass of small shots in a narrow angle.
description.pt_BR: Fire a mass of small shots in a narrow angle.
description.de_DE: Feuere einen Hagel kleiner Geschosse in schmalem Winkel ab.
description.zh_CN: 在很窄的范围内发射出大量小型飞弹。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 在很窄的範圍內發射出大量小型飛彈。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 狭い射角内に小さな弾丸を大量に発射する攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 좁은 각도로 대량의 작은 총알을 발사합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: A very powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy.
description.pt_BR: A very powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy.
description.de_DE: Ein sehr starker Angriff, der genau einen Gegner trifft.
description.zh_CN: 对单个敌人的强大攻击。
description.zh_TW: 對單個敵人的強大攻擊。
description.ja_JP: 敵単体のみにヒットする、とても強力な攻撃。

description.en_US: Performs a fierce whirl attack, engulfing your enemies in flames.
description.pt_BR: Performs a fierce whirl attack, engulfing your enemies in flames.
description.de_DE: Ein heftiger Wirbelangriff, der deine Feinde in Flammen verschlingt.
description.zh_CN: 施展一次强大的旋转攻击，用火焰打击敌人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 施展一次強大的旋轉攻擊，用火焰打擊敵人。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方に強力な回転攻撃をし、敵を炎の渦に包み込む。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 맹렬한 소용돌이 공격으로 적을 불에 휩쓸리게 합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: A controllable blazing burst of fire that deals damage over a small area.
description.pt_BR: A controllable blazing burst of fire that deals damage over a small area.
description.de_DE: Ein kontrollierbarer lodernder Feuerstoß, der auf kleiner Fläche Schaden verursacht.
description.zh_CN: 在一小块区域内施放火焰并造成伤害。产生\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。可以控制方向！<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 在一小塊區域內施放火焰並造成傷害。產生\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。可以控制方向！<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 操作可能な火炎を放射し、小範囲にダメージを与える。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 작은 범위에 대미지를 입히는 조종 가능한 불타는 폭발입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

name.ja_JP: クリムゾンストライク<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Dash through your enemies while leaving a trail of fire.
description.pt_BR: Dash through your enemies while leaving a trail of fire.
description.de_DE: Fege durch deine Feinde hindurch und hinterlasse eine Flammenspur.
description.zh_CN: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，留下一道火焰轨迹。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，留下一道火焰轨迹。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: 敵の中をダッシュで突き抜け、炎の跡を背後に残す。<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Performs a stationary ice whirl attack with wide range and strong knockback.
description.pt_BR: Performs a stationary ice whirl attack with wide range and strong knockback.
description.de_DE: Ein stehender Eiswirbelschlag mit großer Reichweite und starkem Rückstoß.
description.zh_CN: 施展一次固定的冰系旋风斩，范围大击退力强。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 施展一次固定的冰系旋風斬，範圍大擊退力強。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: その場で氷の回転攻撃をする。攻撃範囲が広く、ノックバックも大きい。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 제자리에서 넓은 범위의 얼음 소용돌이 공격과 함께 적을 강하게 밀칩니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Hit enemies with a big snow explosion, caging them within icicles.
description.pt_BR: Hit enemies with a big snow explosion, caging them within icicles.
description.de_DE: Triff deine Feinde mit einer wuchtigen Schnee-Explosion, die sie in Eiskristalle fängt.
description.zh_CN: 用雪球爆炸对敌人造成伤害，并使其困于冰柱之中。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 用雪球爆炸對敵人造成傷害，並使其困於冰柱之中。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 雪の爆発を起こし、当たった敵をつららの檻に閉じ込める。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 큰 눈 폭발로 적을 공격하고 고드름 안에 가둡니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Quickly shoots a mass of icy spikes.
description.pt_BR: Quickly shoots a mass of icy spikes.
description.zh_CN: 快速射出一连串冰刺。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 快速射出一連串冰刺。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 大量のつららを素早く投げつける。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

name.ja_JP: インディゴストライク<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact.
description.pt_BR: Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Ein schneller Dash, der Eiskristalle hinterlässt, die Gegner bei Kontakt verwunden.
description.zh_CN: 高速冲刺，在冲刺路线上留下一道冰柱，并对接触的敌人造成伤害。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 高速冲刺，在冲刺路线上留下一道冰柱，并对接触的敌人造成伤害。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: 高速でダッシュし、通った後につららを残す。つららに触れた敵はダメージを受ける。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ko_KR: 고속으로 대시하고 뒤에 고드름 길을 남겨 이에 닿는 적에게 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Attack with a series of multiple fast spin attacks within a small radius.
description.pt_BR: Attack with a series of multiple fast spin attacks within a small radius.
description.de_DE: Greife mit einer Reihe schneller Wirbelattacken mit kleinem Radius an.
description.zh_CN: 施展一系列小范的快速旋转攻击。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 施展一系列小范的快速旋转攻击。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: 高速な回転攻撃で敵に多段ヒットする。攻撃範囲は小さい。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ko_KR: 적은 반경에서 다수의 빠른 스핀 공격으로 공격합니다.<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Shoot an array of small homing projectiles.
description.pt_BR: Shoot an array of small homing projectiles.
description.zh_CN: 射出一连串小型跟踪飞弹。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 射出一连串小型跟踪飞弹。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: ホーミング性能を持つ小さな電撃を大量に放つ攻撃。<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Dash through enemies leaving a shocking trail of lightning.
description.pt_BR: Dash through enemies leaving a shocking trail of lightning.
description.de_DE: Ein Dash, der eine schockende Blitzspur hinterlässt.
description.zh_CN: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，留下一道闪电轨迹。造成\c[3]电击\c[0]。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 从敌人中间冲刺而过，留下一道闪电轨迹。造成\c[3]电击\c[0]。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: ダッシュで敵を通り抜け、背後に電撃を発生させる攻撃。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ko_KR: 적을 향해 대시하며 번개의 길을 남깁니다.<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
description.pt_BR: Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
description.de_DE: Starker Frontalangriff, der alle getroffenen Feinde weit wegstößt.
description.zh_CN: 面向前方的高伤害攻击，可将所有命中的敌人击飞。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 面向前方的高伤害攻击，可将所有命中的敌人击飞。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を遠くに吹き飛ばす、高ダメージの攻撃。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ko_KR: 높은 대미지의 정면 공격으로, 공격받은 모든 적을 날려버립니다.<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Shoots a super fast projectile penetrating a line of enemies.
description.pt_BR: Shoots a super fast projectile penetrating a line of enemies.
description.de_DE: Feuere ein extrem schnelles Projektil, welches alle Ziele auf einer Linie durchschlägt.
description.zh_CN: 射出一道速度极快的飞弹，穿透一条线上的敌人。
description.zh_TW: 射出一道速度極快的飛彈，穿透一條線上的敵人。
description.ja_JP: 超高速の弾で敵の列を貫通する攻撃。
description.ko_KR: 적 한 줄을 관통하는 매우 빠른 발사체를 쏩니다.

name.ja_JP: ヴェルダント・ストライク<<A<<[JULY 9]

description.en_US: Dash with high speed, damaging and stunning enemies along the way.
description.pt_BR: Dash with high speed, damaging and stunning enemies along the way.
description.de_DE: Sehr schneller Dash, der alle getroffenen Gegner schadet und lähmt.
description.zh_CN: 高速冲刺，对触碰的敌人造成伤害和眩晕效果。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.zh_TW: 高速冲刺，对触碰的敌人造成伤害和眩晕效果。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ja_JP: 高速ダッシュし、当たった敵を気絶させる攻撃。<<A<<[JULY 9]
description.ko_KR: 고속으로 대시하며 가는 길목에 있는 적에게 대미지를 입히고 기절시킵니다.<<A<<[JULY 9]
